mechanics.condition: Target is a creature that has died within the last minute AND Target did not die of old age
mechanics.outcome: Target returns to life with 1 hit point

mechanics.trigger: Attempt to return a creature to life using Revivify
mechanics.outcome: Spell Fails (Cannot return creature to life)
Missing body parts are NOT restored by this spell

description_text: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
